import React, { useState, useRef, useEffect } from "react"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import "./transfer.css"; const TransferForm = () => { const location = useLocation(); const asset = location.state?.asset; // Get asset details from navigation state const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("currentUser")); const [name, setName] = useState(user?.username || ""); return (

Transfer Asset

setName(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter your Name" readOnly={Boolean(user)} />
); }; export default TransferForm;
